means: （尤指向慈善机构）捐赠( donate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The silver trophy was donated by a Leicester businessman.
sentence.Network_cn: 银制奖杯是由一个莱斯特的商人捐赠的。

sentence.Network_en: He has maintained that the money was donated for international purposes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坚称这笔捐款将用于国际用途。
其他人捐赠了一些旧衣服。

PerfectNetExp.abs: recently donated ＄100 million in stock to charity ., 最近他将股票的 1亿美元捐赠给了慈善机构.
All throughout the evening auction the money will be donated to the " Olympic Stars " fund ., 整个晚会全部的竞拍款项将全部捐献给 " 奥运之星 " 保障基金.
and donated to the national trust ., 并捐献给国家信托.
correctly sharing the providing evidence responsibility of additional donated commodity created harms ., 正确分担附赠商品致人损害的举证责任.

化学及化工专业词汇英语翻译(D-I) ... dominant wave length 吱长 donator 供体 donnan's equilibrium 道南平衡.

entry.def: If you donate something to a charity or other organization, you give it to them.

example.ex: He frequently donates large sums to charity...
example.tran: 他常常向慈善机构捐赠大笔钱款。
其他人捐赠了一些旧衣服。

entry.def: If you donate your blood or a part of your body, you allow doctors to use it to help someone who is ill.

example.ex: ...people who are willing to donate their organs for use after death...
example.tran: 愿意死后捐献器官的人们

example.ex: All donated blood is screened for HIV.
example.tran: 所献血液一律要经过人体免疫缺陷病毒的筛查。

means.word_mean: 1. given freely especially to a cause or fund;

sentences.sentence: "the donated van made their meal-on-wheels venture possible"
